name: Project Angel Survivor - Alpha Demo
description:
What is This?

Project Angel Survivor (tentative name) is the strategy RPG inspired by the Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Survivor series.

This game includes demon designs from a fan-made Megaten-style "modern" demon compendium created by EVTrained.

You can find a link to their [catalog of demon designs] on their art blog, [Thematic Conversion].

This game is very incomplete. I plan to continue working on the game to include new mechanics, features, demons and characters.

Feedback is highly appreciated!

Credits
